attributes.action: Legalise possession of cannabis and natural cannabis oil for self medication
attributes.additional_details:
This is a petition demanding the Government allow the use of cannabis to self medicate, not just for cancer but for pretty much any disease or illness. The cannabis oil that is produced from this plant (Google Rick Simpson / Run from the cure) contains high levels of THC and other cannabinoids that help maintain the balance in the regulatory systems within, as it is ingested it works very fast to invigorate the body into curing itself. The majority of illnesses and diseases are caused by imbalances, the THC simply balance the imbalances. It has been shown to work in countless institutional and medical studies across the world and was being prescribed by pharmacists as recently as the early 1900's.
This is a natural medicine with curative and preventative properties for almost any illness or disease without the horrendous side effects of modern drugs and treatments, we need to be allowed to use it with the law on our side.
